mapper.select: SELECT BETSEQ, MAX(BETDATE) AS BETDATE, AVG(BETCASH) AS BETCASH, (SELECT CASE WHEN SUM(NVL(BETRESULT,-999)) BETWEEN -999999 AND -1 THEN '대기중' WHEN SUM(BETRESULT)=COUNT(BETSEQ) THEN '적중' ELSE '적중실패' END "BETRESULTSTRING" FROM BET_HISTORY) AS BETRESULTSTRING FROM BET_HISTORY WHERE USERID = #{userId} GROUP BY BETSEQ
SELECT GAMESEQ, USERID, BETSEQ, BETCHOICE, BETDATE, BETCASH, BETP, BETWPRICE, BETRESULT FROM BET_HISTORY WHERE BETSEQ=#{betSeq} AND USERID=#{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BET_HISTORY ( GAMESEQ, USERID, BETSEQ, BETCHOICE, BETDATE, BETP, BETCASH ) VALUES ( #{gameSeq}, #{userId}, #{betSeq}, #{betChoice}, SYSDATE, #{betP}, #{betCash} )
